summary: A very simple shelter in Whiterun.
descriptionHtml:
Whiterun Shelter
v1.1
by Nart2007

A very simple shelter in Whiterun. The lanterns and cooking fire can be turned on and off. There are 2 chests up in the loft, and a bedroll. All storage items are safe to store your things (non-respawning). It is fully nav-meshed with idle and furniture markers for a follower. If you have Real Shelter - Full Release by Robinsage, you can watch the rain fall from inside the shelter without getting wet!

New in v1.1:

1) Added markers for the player to sit up on the ledges in the loft.
2) Added removable boards to put stuff in (i.e., your Guild HQ Marker from the great mod Guild Starter, by Sokco816.

Cleaned with TES5Edit.

Recommended Mods that work nicely with this mod:

Frostfall - Hypothermia Camping Survival by Chesko (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11163/?)

Real Shelter - Full Release by Robinsage (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52612/?)

Guild Starter by Sokco816 (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52871/?)
author: Nart2007
